Class Trigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivescript.Trigger

  • public class Trigger
extends java.lang.Object
    A trigger class for RiveScript.

      Test whether the trigger has a %Previous.
      void hasPrevious(boolean paired)
      Flag that this trigger is paired with a %Previous (and shouldn't be sorted with the other triggers for reply matching purposes).

      List conditions under this trigger.

      List redirections under this trigger.

        Flag that this trigger is paired with a %Previous (and shouldn't be sorted with the other triggers for reply matching purposes).
